title: White Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup milk, or more as needed
method: Step 2: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium-low heat.
Step 3: Whisk in flour to form a thick paste; cook and stir until golden in color, about 5 to 7 minutes.
Step 4: Whisk in 1 cup milk; cook and stir until thickened, about 5 minutes more. Add more milk to reach desired consistency.
